resources.string: Something went wrong : ( That\'s okay, make sure your network connection is ok and try again!
Free this weekend?\nPress "Go" and Going will match you with 3 people around you. Chat with your matches in the app and make plans to go somewhere cool!
Matches disappear when the weekend ends. Choose who you want to keep in touch with by adding them to your friends list.
Go again next weekend to make new matches and meet more people!

We don’t use any photos, and we don’t post anything to Facebook.

We ask for your birthday and hometown to fill out your profile.

We use location services and Facebook login to make sure you get matched with real people around you.

Finally, Go is for people who want to meet people, so we ask for your friends who use the app so you don’t get matched with people you already know!

Hey there! Going matches you with cool people around you based on age and gender. That\'s why we ask everyone to set up a full profile before they use the app. If that\'s okay with you, please fill in the missing fields below before getting started!
What gender do you identify with?
One of your required fields is missing! Please set up your profile before continuing.
The birthday you entered is not working. Please enter a valid birthday!
You\'ve been matched, but there was a problem displaying your match details. Verify your network connection and try again.
Match me in groups by gender:
So then who is this app for?
Going is for people who want to meet people. If (a) you like meeting new people and (b) you\'re free this weekend, then Going is for you!
Matches are groups of 4 people that are free to hang out this weekend. Matches are made based on age and gender preferences.
Why do matches only last for the weekend?
Matches disappear every week so you can make new matches and meet more people.
When your matches disappear, you\'ll be prompted to choose who you want to keep as friends.
Why can’t I choose my matches?
Going is a place where unlikely friendships are made. You set your preferences based on age and gender, and chance takes care of the rest!
Who are you people? Why are you doing this?

We are concerned citizens who miss the times when you didn\'t need an excuse to hang out with strangers and make new friends. So we imagined a big orange button that summoned new people and made it into this app.
We are totally just getting started! And we’re far from perfect, so if you found a bug, you’d be doing us a huge favor by letting us know below — we’ll buy you a drink!
Thoughts? Feelings? Hunches? Cool stories? Get in touch and send us a message, we’d love to hear from you : )
Press "Go" and Going will match you with 3 people around you based on your age and gender preferences.
Chat with your matches in the app and make plans to go somewhere cool! Matches disappear when the weekend ends.
Choose who you want to keep in touch with by adding them to your friends list. Go again next weekend to meet more people!
More questions? Check out the FAQ in the Settings tab.
This chat will disappear after this weekend. Make plans to meet, and have fun!
After deletion, this contact will be removed from your friend list and will be unable to contact you again. Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
If a user makes you feel at all uncomfortable, please report them. They will be flagged, removed from your friends list and prevented from contacting you again.
Something is rotten in the state of your network connection… No worries, just try again later!
Sorry, there was an error loading your friends list. Verify your network connection and try again!
